effects: maneuvers: learn 3 maneuvers from the Battle Master list
maneuvers known: +2 at fighter levels 7, 10, and 15
superiority dice: start with 4d8; +1 die at fighter levels 7 and 15
maneuver usage: only one maneuver per attack
maneuver save DC: 8 + your Strength or Dexterity modifier (your choice) + Proficiency Bonus
limits: maneuver swap: when you learn new maneuvers, you can replace one you know
superiority dice: regain all on a short or long rest

effects: You gain proficiency with one type of Artisan’s Tools of your choice, and you gain proficiency in one skill of your choice from the skills available to Fighters at level 1.
learn a creature's immunities, resistances, and vulnerabilities (if any)
limits: refresh: expend 1 superiority die to restore a use (no action)

effects: Your Superiority Die becomes a d10.
once per turn when you use a maneuver, roll 1d8 and use that roll instead of expending a superiority die
